description.value: With sinews of bronze and thews of iron, you leap to the heavens, piercing the arrogant eyes of the gods. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap] up to your total Speed, either horizontally or vertically, and Strike twice at any point or points during the Leap. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but don't increase your penalty until you have made both attacks.
